title: Statuette of a Seated Boy? or Man?
description:
Statuette of seated boy (?) or man (?) ion green fayence. Figure apparently nude with left hand held to mouth and is seated in high-backed chair. Right hand against thigh. Wide flat head with eyes and mouth indicated by incisions. A rare type. All surfaces glazed.
Condition: Glaze worn and in places chipped slightly.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
